lyrics.text: Lesson four. An exciting trip. First listen and then answer the question. Why is Tim finding
lyrics.translation: 第四课。一次激动人心的旅行。首先听录音，然后回答问题。为什么Tim觉得

lyrics.text: this trip exciting? I have just received a letter from my brother, Tim. He is in Australia. He
lyrics.translation: 这次旅行令人兴奋吗？我刚刚收到我弟弟蒂姆的来信。他在澳大利亚。他

lyrics.text: has been there for six months. Tim is an engineer. He is working for a big firm and he has already
lyrics.translation: 已经在那里待了六个月。蒂姆是一名工程师。他在一家大公司工作，他已经

lyrics.text: visited a great number of different places in Australia. He has just bought an Australian
lyrics.translation: 参观了澳大利亚许多不同的地方。他刚刚买了一辆澳大利亚产的

lyrics.text: car and has gone to Alice Springs, a small town in the centre of Australia. He will soon visit
lyrics.translation: 汽车已经去了澳大利亚中心的小镇爱丽斯泉。他很快将访问

lyrics.text: Darwin. From there he will fly to Perth. My brother has never been abroad before so he is finding this
lyrics.translation: 达尔文。从那里他将飞往珀斯。我弟弟以前从未出过国，所以他觉得这
